SEARCH
Package photo68.view

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
photo68.view.UserController
public class UserController extends Object
The `UserController` class is responsible for managing the user's albums, including creating, deleting, renaming, and opening albums. It also handles the logout functionality and saving the updated user data to a file.

    • UserController

      public UserController()

  • Method Details

    • initData

      public void initData(User user, ArrayList<User> controlLolerList)
      Initializes the controller with the current user and the list of all users. Populates the album ListView with the current user's albums and sets up the button states.
      Parameters:
      user - the current user
      controlLolerList - the list of all users

    • createAlbum

      public void createAlbum()
      Handles the "Create Album" button click. Opens a dialog to prompt the user for the new album name, creates the album, and updates the UI.

    • deleteAlbum

      public void deleteAlbum()
      Handles the "Delete Album" button click. Removes the selected album from the current user's album list and updates the UI.

    • openAlbum

      public void openAlbum(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Handles the "Open Album" button click. Loads the AlbumView FXML file, creates a new scene, and passes the selected album to the AlbumController.
      Parameters:
      e - the ActionEvent triggered by clicking the "Open Album" button

    • renameAlbum

      public void renameAlbum()
      Handles the "Rename Album" button click. Creates a TextInputDialog to allow the user to enter a new name for the selected album and updates the album name.

    • logout

      public void logout(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Handles the "Logout" button click. Saves the updated user data and switches the view to the LoginView.
      Parameters:
      e - the ActionEvent triggered by clicking the "Logout" button

    • showAlert

      private void showAlert(javafx.scene.control.Alert.AlertType alertType, String title, String content)
      Displays an alert dialog with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      alertType - the type of alert (e.g., ERROR, WARNING)
      title - the title of the alert
      content - the content to be displayed in the alert

    • saveUsers

      private void saveUsers()
      Saves the updated list of users to a file.
